preference.name: MEConstraintsViewDefaultAutomaticLayoutModePref
preference.preference_description: Defines the initial state of the Automatic Layout button when opening a new Line Balancing Constraints view. When on, Teamcenter automatically organizes the placement of nodes after each operation that you perform in the view, such as adding or deleting nodes, or adding or deleting constraints. Valid Values: true - The automatic layout mode is turned on by default.
